title: model: predict method should take sources
body:
We need to modify the `predict` method in Model and in all the models to have a
signature as follows:


```python
    async def predict(self, sources: SourcesContext) -> AsyncIterator[Record]:
```

The issue is that we aren't being passed a source so we can't call
`sources.with_features`, which is important because it will validate that the
records have the features we're trying to train on, as per f16248ba

Here's a start at what needs to be done.

```diff
diff --git a/dffml/high_level.py b/dffml/high_level.py
index f0456715..1017a909 100644
--- a/dffml/high_level.py
+++ b/dffml/high_level.py
@@ -498,7 +498,7 @@ async def predict(
     sources = _records_to_sources(*args)
     async with sources as sources, model as model:
         async with sources() as sctx, model() as mctx:
-            async for record in mctx.predict(sctx.records()):
+            async for record in mctx.predict(sctx):
                 yield record if keep_record else (
                     record.key,
                     record.features(),
diff --git a/model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/scikit_base.py b/model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/scikit_base.py
index d3d3c1b2..44d5255e 100644
--- a/model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/scikit_base.py
+++ b/model/scikit/dffml_model_scikit/scikit_base.py
@@ -13,7 +13,7 @@ from typing import AsyncIterator, Tuple, Any, NamedTuple
 from sklearn.metrics import silhouette_score, mutual_info_score
 
 from dffml.record import Record
-from dffml.source.source import Sources
+from dffml.source.source import Sources, SourcesContext
 from dffml.model.accuracy import Accuracy
 from dffml.model.model import ModelConfig, ModelContext, Model, ModelNotTrained
 from dffml.feature.feature import Features, Feature
@@ -107,12 +107,10 @@ class ScikitContext(ModelContext):
         self.logger.debug("Model Accuracy: {}".format(self.confidence))
         return self.confidence
 
-    async def predict(
-        self, records: AsyncIterator[Record]
-    ) -> AsyncIterator[Tuple[Record, Any, float]]:
+    async def predict(self, sources: SourcesContext) -> AsyncIterator[Record]:
         if not self._filepath.is_file():
             raise ModelNotTrained("Train model before prediction.")
-        async for record in records:
+        async for record in sources.with_features(self.features):
             feature_data = record.features(self.features)
             df = self.pd.DataFrame(feature_data, index=[0])
             predict = self.np.array(df)
```
